original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: Israel begins operation to take over Gaza City, with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordering a shortened timeline for the defeat of Hamas. The IDF is expected to present its plan for the capture of Gaza City to Netanyahu on Thursday. The conflict, which began in October 2023, has resulted in over 62,000 deaths and 156,000 injuries in Israeli attacks on Gaza.</s>
